reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: QESh was founded in 2005 as an association with the purpose of creating a safe/tolerant/gay-friendly environment for the LGBTQ community of Kosovo through awareness ? raising activities for the general society and support activities for the LGBTQ community . Description of the key activities of the organisation: To make sure that the mission is completed QESh mandate is to work in three fields/objectives:- Lobbing and advocacy ? QESh advocates to other decision-making and law-enforcement authorities such as the Kosovo Police as well as to NGO?s that promote the Human Rights. Lobbying with all relevant policy-makers in Kosovo. Documenting the Human Rights violations based on sexual orientation. Reporting different discrimination cases in the media- Awareness r ising of the general community regarding LGBTQ issues in Kosovo - Creating and updating a web-site with different information on the LGBTQ lifestyle issues news laws and activities. Cooperating with print and electronic media both in Kosovo and abroad in i nforming about the daily life of LGBTQ?s in Kosovo. Various awareness campaigns ? through disseminating different awareness material.- Empowering the LGBTQ community ? Organising social events for the LGBTQ community, providing psychological counselling an d legal information for LGBTQ community, creating a safe place (through implementing all the above activities), providing training for LGBTQ community. At the moment QESh will not concentrate on directly empowering LGBTQ community.
